transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan sir, maine log out kar diya tha 6 baj gaye hain ab.
Customer: Chalo subah baat karta hu sir is inke jo wo hai title vagaira kuch mein gadbad hoga sir isme ab aise clay Buddha statue likh raha hai.
Executive: Aise aise hai na pura padh ke kariyega hai na. Main bhi aapke sath late ho gaya main aapko.
Customer: Pura kya wo title jab aap galat aa raha hai mere pass likh ke to ye batao na.
Executive: Nahi nahi aise mat kariyega marble wale mein to sir jo lead aa rahi thi.
Customer: Are marble udhar aata nahi hai likha tabhi karta hu na main wo aapki galti hai wo kaise lead bana kar de rahe ho aap.
Executive: Chalo theek hai. Main subah baat karta hu is cheez ke liye aap se.
Customer: Subah main detail nikalwaunga inki jab main baat karta hu aap se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Title showing incorrectly as clay Buddha statue.

- Incorrect leads are being generated.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, title, marble
